trigger: New SMS sent to phone number
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you send an SMS on your Android device to a phone number you specify.
This Trigger fires every time you receive any new SMS on your Android device.

This Trigger fires every time you receive an SMS on your Android device that matches a search you specify.

trigger: New SMS received from phone number
